# Tender Announcement

## Project Title
Renovation and Upgrade of the Administrative Building at 264 Chemin du Quai, Cap-aux-Meules, Quebec

## Reference Number
WS3793632499-Doc3793732620

## Solicitation Number
WS3793632499

## Tender Status
**Expired**

## Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: January 17, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## Project Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Transport Canada, is seeking a contractor to perform the renovation and upgrading of the administrative building located at 264 Chemin du Quai, Cap-aux-Meules, Quebec. The project requires specialized public building construction services.

## Tender Process

The tender process is competitive and open to bidding. The selection criteria for the contractor will be based on the lowest price.

## Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Godin2, Joanne (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: joanne.godin2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Additional Information

The tender documents are available on the Ariba Discovery platform at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14918069?extsite=MTQ5MTgwNjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14918069?extsite=MTQ5MTgwNjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) or by contacting the contact person listed above. Interested contractors are invited to submit their proposals in accordance with the tender documents.
